description:
You wake up in a stony rpg game with no memories why or on how to escape.

(btw this game was made solo for the n8jam where we had to make a game in 7 days. Its Playtime is around 30mins from the start till the end)

(READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTON PLEASE)

Controls:

Esc - Open Options Terminal (Setting Music/SFX Volume)

WASD/Arrow keys - Moving around (Ingame and in Menus)

Tab/Q - Sprint (don't ask)

I - Open Inventory

E/Space - Interaction with NPCs

(Also) Space -continue text and do stuff in the inventory

No mouse required at all

WARNING: PRESSING CTRL + C WHILE NOTHING INSIDE THE WINDOW IS SELECTED WILL CLOSE THE TERMINAL WINDOW (THE GAME)!!!

There is no Quest Menu and you can't save your progress.

Also if you are stuck, I would suggest talking to the NPCs and looking in your inventory/Terminal and just taking a stroll around the map.

And since ppl tend to miss it, you can interact with stuff in your inventory, by selecting it with the arrow keys and pressing space.

Also you can scroll into the console window with ctrl + scrollwheel

(BTW the ending is a bit anticlimactic lol)
